title: do i have a silver brain

embed.description: emilyemilyemily9 / Silver 4 29LP / 367W 401L Win Ratio 48% / Yasuo - 39W 48L Win Ratio 45%, Nasus - 38W 32L Win Ratio 54%, Jarvan IV - 37W 28L Win Ratio 57%, Renekton - 30W 29L Win Ratio 51%, Lee Sin - 20W 27L Win Ratio 43%

body:
hey i dont know if part of me is braindead or something but this nasus build is doing really well. is it the player or the build should experiment it?
the game play centered around hit and run over and over again every 2 seconds and it was stupidly hard to hit him with skills shots had 2 qss basically.
quite literally 1 to 2 shots any squishies.

replies.body: It's a glistening grayish sort of thing, but more of a darker sheen, not really silver.
so the build iron or the player iron shit if it is the player imma play it and magic that magic work on myself

> [{quoted}](name=FATRATComing ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=j1U9LV1h,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-12-15T07:21:18.094+0000)
>
> so the build iron or the player iron shit if it is the player imma play it and magic that magic work on myself

Well, iron is usually alloyed into steel before we build things out of it, so... sort of?

looks like your average nasus build. trinity for that extra q damage, tankyness for sustain.
the only unusual stuff is {{item:3033}} as nasus really doesnt need the armor pen imo
and essenz reaver as his q resets hard enough
thx preciate the comment will try it
